Japanese:
//Text $1AA9A0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BD74)
白ユリに似た形をした花。[LINE]
花の汁は、危険な薬の材料になる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AA9A0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BD74)
Flower resembling a white lily.[LINE]
Its sap can be used to make [LINE]
a dangerous medicine.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA940
#WRITE(ptr,$18BD78)
シュサイアの近くには見た目は綺麗だけれど[LINE]
危険な薬の材料になる植物が自生している[LINE]
らしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA940
#WRITE(ptr,$18BD78)
It seems there's a beautiful but[LINE]
dangerous flower that grows in[LINE]
the vicinity of Josaia.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA8D8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BD90)
するどいくちばしを持つ鳥。[LINE]
「ウソツツキにつつかれるよ」と、親は子の[LINE]
ウソをしかる。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA8D8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BD90)
Sharp-beaked bird that deceitful children[LINE]
are warned of by their parents.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA870
#WRITE(ptr,$18BD94)
ストレイライズ神殿へ巡礼に来る途中の村で、[LINE]
子供に嫌われているおもしろい動物の話を[LINE]
耳にしたという。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA870
#WRITE(ptr,$18BD94)
There's talk of an interesting creature[LINE]
from the children in the village on the[LINE]
way to Straylize Temple.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA818
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDAC)
身体の三倍の長さの角を持つカブトムシ。[LINE]
強そうだが弱い。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AA818
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDAC)
Rhinoceros beetle with a horn three[LINE]
times its body size. It looks strong,[LINE]
but it's weak.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA7B0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDB0)
緑の外殻には昆虫もいるらしい。[LINE]
確か技術研究施設のある空中都市の近く[LINE]
だったような気がしたそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA7B0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDB0)
It seems there's an insect on the Outer Sell.[LINE]
It's probably near the city with a research lab.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA748
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDC8)
体長１０メートルはあると言われる大蛇の皮。[LINE]
持っていると金持ちになれるという噂がある。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AA748
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDC8)
Skin from a snake 10 meters in length.[LINE]
Rumor has it those who possess it are[LINE]
met with great fortune.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA6E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDCC)
ストレイライズ神殿にお参りに行ったら、[LINE]
懐があたたかくなるような気がするものを[LINE]
見つけたらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA6E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDCC)
It seems something was found on the way to[LINE]
Straylize Temple that'll fill your wallet up.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA688
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDE4)
新月の夜に、ぼんやり光る花を咲かせる植物。[LINE]
花が咲いた様子はとても幻想的。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AA688
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDE4)
Flowering plant that blooms under the[LINE]
new moon. The faint glow it gives off[LINE]
is almost magical.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA630
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDE8)
暗くなった世界に希望の火を灯すような[LINE]
植物があるという。[LINE]
海に浮かぶどこかの島らしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA630
#WRITE(ptr,$18BDE8)
There's a plant said to be a beacon[LINE]
of hope in a darkened world.[LINE]
Seems it's on an island off at sea.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA5C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE00)
巧みに雪山を滑り降りる犬。[LINE]
その技術には「ホットドッグなドッグだ」と[LINE]
驚きの声多数。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA5C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE00)
Dog that skillfully slides down snowy mountains.[LINE]
Many cry out "He's really hot-doggin'!"[LINE]
upon seeing it in action.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA550
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE04)
都会のほうでは、人間もビックリするような[LINE]
行動をする動物が話題になっているという。[LINE]
どうやら、この地方特有の行動らしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA550
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE04)
There's some sort of creature that's got[LINE]
the whole town talking about its feats.[LINE]
Seems to have something to do with the locale.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA4E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE1C)
夫婦仲がとても良いネズミ。[LINE]
寄り添う様子が常にくちづけをしている[LINE]
ように見える。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA4E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE1C)
Mice with especially great chemistry.[LINE]
They appear to always be huddled[LINE]
together and locked in a kiss.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA470
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE20)
雪国でなくても寒いのだろうか？[LINE]
国境を越えた先のセインガルドの村の周辺に、[LINE]
いつも寄り添っている動物がいるそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA470
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE20)
It gets cold even outside the land of snow.[LINE]
Seems there's some animals that are always[LINE]
cuddled together past the border towards Seinegald.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA400
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE38)
樹木に色とりどりの飾りや、ロウソクなどが[LINE]
付けられたもの。[LINE]
誰がこのようなものを……[END]
English:
//Text $1AA400
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE38)
Tree decorated with multicolored ornaments[LINE]
and candles. Who would do such a thing...?[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA380
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE3C)
二年前の動乱で減少した旅行客の数が、街の[LINE]
近くの話題のスポットを目当てに増えている。[LINE]
名無しのいたずら者に街の人は大感謝らしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA380
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE3C)
The incident two years ago took a toll on[LINE]
tourism numbers, but they're flocking once again.[LINE]
Seems the citizens are thanking some mystery prankster.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA330
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE54)
昆虫に擬態して鳥を誘い、留まった鳥を[LINE]
くっつけて離さない植物。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AA330
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE54)
Plant that mimics insects to attract[LINE]
birds, then never lets them go.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA2B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE58)
フィッツガルドの田舎の風景がのどかだから[LINE]
といって自然をなめてはいけないらしい。[LINE]
中にはとても恐ろしい植物がいるそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA2B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE58)
It seems the tranquility of Fitzgald's countryside[LINE]
is no reason to let your guard down. Particularly[LINE]
in the face of on particularly terrifying plant.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA258
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE70)
霧氷の一種で、樹についた水滴が凍りついて[LINE]
できたもの。[LINE]
樹に花が咲いたように見える。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA258
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE70)
A type of hoarfrost formed when water[LINE]
droplets freeze on trees. Gives them the[LINE]
appearance of being in bloom.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA1E0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE74)
都会でも外にでて周りの植物を見渡せば、[LINE]
自然の厳しさと美しさを感じる事ができる[LINE]
現象が起こるのが雪国というものらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA1E0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE74)
There seems to be a natural phenomenon outside[LINE]
of a snowy city that makes you appreciate both the[LINE]
harshness and beauty of nature.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA158
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE8C)
空気中の水分が細かい氷の粒になって漂い、[LINE]
太陽に照らされて輝く自然現象。[LINE]
キラキラと光る様子は、とても美しい。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA158
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE8C)
Natural phenomenon in which sunlight shines[LINE]
through small ice particles suspended in the air.[LINE]
The twinkling lights are a sight to behold.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA0E0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE90)
二年前の動乱があった街では周辺の植物も[LINE]
被害を受けたが、まばゆい宝石のような輝き[LINE]
だけは誰にも奪われなかったという。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA0E0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BE90)
Despite the incident two years ago taking a toll on even[LINE]
the vegetation around the city, it's said there's still[LINE]
something precious there that nobody can take away.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA088
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEA8)
近づく者に雪を投げつけるという[LINE]
珍しい植物。[LINE]
普段は丸まっている。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA088
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEA8)
Rare plant that hurtles snow at[LINE]
passersby. Usually remains furled.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AA008
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEAC)
セインガルドから来た行商人が国境を越えて[LINE]
少し行ったところで、人にいたずらをする[LINE]
奇妙な植物を見つけたと言っていたらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1AA008
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEAC)
There are reports from merchants coming from[LINE]
Seinegald of a curious plant that play tricks[LINE]
on those trying to cross the border.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9F98
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEC4)
見つけると、どんな願い事も叶うという[LINE]
言い伝えのある植物。[LINE]
旅のお守りとしても使われる。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9F98
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEC4)
Plant said to grant any wishes to[LINE]
those who find it. Also used as a[LINE]
traveling charm.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9F38
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEC8)
願い事があるのなら、ノイシュタットの[LINE]
周辺に自生している鮮やかな植物を探して[LINE]
みると良いらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9F38
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEC8)
If you've got a wish you want granted,[LINE]
you might want to take a look around[LINE]
Neustadt for a certain dazzling plant.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9EC8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEE0)
輝く節の中から黄金とともに美しい姫が[LINE]
生まれたという伝説がある竹。[LINE]
しなやかだが、とても堅い。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9EC8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEE0)
Legends speak of shining bamboo that[LINE]
birthed gold and a beautiful princess.[LINE]
Flexible, yet quite firm.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9E80
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEE4)
モリュウの領地には不思議な伝説のある[LINE]
神秘的な植物があるそうだ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A9E80
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEE4)
There seems to be a mystical plant that's[LINE]
the subject of a strange myth near Moreau.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9E20
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEFC)
黄金色に輝く見事な羽を持つアゲハチョウ。[LINE]
マニア垂涎の希少昆虫。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A9E20
#WRITE(ptr,$18BEFC)
Swallowtail butterfly with magnificent glittering[LINE]
golden wings. Highly sought-after by collectors.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9DB8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF00)
海に浮かぶ島々の中には、世間と隔絶された[LINE]
環境に守られた、希少な昆虫が生息する[LINE]
場所もあるという。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9DB8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF00)
Some of the islands out at sea are said to[LINE]
be home to rare insects, protected by an[LINE]
environment isolated from the outside world.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9D40
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF18)
地熱で適度に暖められた地下水が地上に[LINE]
噴出してできた天然の温泉。[LINE]
温まる以外にもいろいろな効能がある。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9D40
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF18)
Hot spring formed naturally by groundwater[LINE]
heated to perfection by geothermal energy.[LINE]
A dip inside is good for more than just warmth.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9CE0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF1C)
温泉が有名なスノーフリアだが、人里離れた[LINE]
場所に万病を治す事のできる秘湯中の[LINE]
秘湯があるそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9CE0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF1C)
Frostheim is famous for its hot springs,[LINE]
but it seems there's a secret spring[LINE]
in a remote area that can cure all diseases.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9C68
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF34)
飛ぶ事ができない巨大鳥類の卵。[LINE]
綺麗な深緑色と大きさからエッグアートの[LINE]
世界では重宝されている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9C68
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF34)
Eggs of an enormous flightless bird.[LINE]
Considered priceless in the world of egg[LINE]
art due to their size and beautiful colors.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9BF0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF38)
一見、砂漠には生き物がいないと思うかも[LINE]
しれないが、チェリクの周辺を探すと巨大な[LINE]
動物が生息している事がわかるらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9BF0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF38)
At a glance it might not seem like anything[LINE]
could survive in the desert, but it appears there[LINE]
are traces around Cherik that would show otherwise.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9B98
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF50)
高速でジャンプをするイナゴ。[LINE]
捕まえれば子供たちのヒーローになれる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A9B98
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF50)
Grasshopper that jumps at high speeds.[LINE]
Catch one and you'll win the hearts of children.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9B28
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF54)
クレスタには子供たちに見せてあげれば[LINE]
尊敬される昆虫が近くにいるそうだが、[LINE]
捕まえるのはとても難しいらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9B28
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF54)
There seems to be insects around Cresta[LINE]
that when caught, will earn you great respect[LINE]
from the local children due to the difficulty involved.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9AD0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF6C)
樹齢１０００年を超える巨大な樹。[LINE]
その生命力に人は憧れ、信仰の対象とした。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A9AD0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF6C)
Great tree over 1000 years old.[LINE]
Its vitality is longed for by many,[LINE]
and it became an object of worship.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9A68
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF70)
シデン領地には人々にとても大事にされて[LINE]
いる植物があるらしい。[LINE]
他の植物と見分けられる目印があるそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9A68
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF70)
There appears to be a plant venerated[LINE]
by the people near Shiden. It supposedly[LINE]
has some sort of distinguishing marker.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A99E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF88)
この貝が砂の上で踊ると、海が目覚め[LINE]
風を呼び、波を起こすという言い伝えがある。[LINE]
船乗りたちは海難防止のお守りにしている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A99E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF88)
This shellfish's dance is said to wake the sea,[LINE]
summon the winds and raise the waves. Sailors[LINE]
use it as a charm to prevent shipwrecks.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9990
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF8C)
どこかの海岸には海に関する不思議な[LINE]
伝説のある動物がいるというが、詳細は不明[LINE]
らしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9990
#WRITE(ptr,$18BF8C)
There's said to be a creature with a strange legend[LINE]
related to the ocean on the shore, but the details are unclear.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9920
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFA4)
角のように見える発達した三本の長い歯が[LINE]
特徴的なクジラの仲間。[LINE]
体が三角形というわけではない。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9920
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFA4)
Cetacean with 3 long protruding teeth[LINE]
that resemble horns. Its figure does[LINE]
not actually resemble a hat.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A98B0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFA8)
海のどこかに、おもしろい角を持つ動物が[LINE]
棲息しているそうだが、希少動物のため、[LINE]
めったに見る事ができないという。[END]
English:
//Text $1A98B0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFA8)
It is said that somewhere in the ocean there[LINE]
lives an animal with interesting horns, but its[LINE]
scarcity makes it a rare sight.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9848
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFC0)
大きなヒレで風に乗って空を飛ぶ巨大エイ。[LINE]
最大飛行距離は５００メートルともいわれる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A9848
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFC0)
Giant ray whose great fins allow it to catch the[LINE]
wind and glide. It's said to be able to travel[LINE]
distances of up to 500 meters before landing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A97E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFC4)
船で航海をしていると、空が突然暗くなる[LINE]
場所があるらしい。[LINE]
船乗りの間では有名な話だそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A97E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFC4)
Seems there's a spot out at sea where the[LINE]
sky suddenly darkens. Stories about it are[LINE]
famous among sailors.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9778
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFDC)
レンズ状の細胞が、わずかな光でも反射して[LINE]
緑色に光る植物。[LINE]
ヒカリゴケ自身が光るわけではない。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9778
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFDC)
Plant that reflects a dim green light[LINE]
off its lens shaped cells. It does not[LINE]
produce light itself.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9730
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFE0)
ロディオンの近くには幻想的な雰囲気を持つ[LINE]
植物が自生しているそうだ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A9730
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFE0)
There appears to be a plant with a wondrous[LINE]
aura in the vicinity of Rodeon.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A96C0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFF8)
青白く燃え上がる不気味な火の玉。[LINE]
土の中にある動物の骨などに含まれるリンが[LINE]
蓄積され、自然発火したもの。[END]
English:
//Text $1A96C0
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFF8)
Eerie fireballs that burns with a pale light.[LINE]
Caused by the spontaneous combustion of[LINE]
gases produced by buried animal remains.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9668
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFFC)
アンスズーンの周辺には、地上の生き物の[LINE]
怨念が空中をさまよっている場所がある[LINE]
らしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9668
#WRITE(ptr,$18BFFC)
It seems there's a spot near Deimos[LINE]
where the grudges left by earthly[LINE]
creatures wander through the air.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9600
#WRITE(ptr,$18C014)
叫んでいるドクロの顔のように見える岩。[LINE]
穴から聞こえる風の音は、まるで悲鳴のよう。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A9600
#WRITE(ptr,$18C014)
Crag that looks like a screaming skull.[LINE]
The wind passing through sounds just[LINE]
like a scream.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9598
#WRITE(ptr,$18C018)
ダイクロフトの近くには恐ろしい悲鳴が[LINE]
聞こえてくる場所があるというが、正体を[LINE]
確認した者はいないらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9598
#WRITE(ptr,$18C018)
It is said that there is a place near Dycroft[LINE]
where horrible screams can be heard, but[LINE]
one has ever been able to confirm its source.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9548
#WRITE(ptr,$18C030)
外殻で突然変異を起こしたミミズ。[LINE]
色が黒く、俊敏な動きをする。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A9548
#WRITE(ptr,$18C030)
Earthworm that mutated on the Outer Shell.[LINE]
Jet-black in color and nimble in movement.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A94E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C034)
シュサイアの近くには素早く動く動物がいる[LINE]
らしいが、動きが速すぎて捕まえる事は[LINE]
難しいという。[END]
English:
//Text $1A94E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C034)
There seems to be a very fast creature near Josaia,[LINE]
but it's said to be so fast it's impossible to catch.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9480
#WRITE(ptr,$18C04C)
炎のような赤いたてがみを持つ馬。[LINE]
気性が激しいので乗りこなすのは大変だが、[LINE]
脚はとても速い。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9480
#WRITE(ptr,$18C04C)
Horse with a fiery red mane.[LINE]
Quick as a flash, but its violent[LINE]
temperament makes it hard to handle.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9430
#WRITE(ptr,$18C050)
トウケイの領土には、美しさと激しさを[LINE]
兼ね備えた魅力的な動物がいるそうだ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A9430
#WRITE(ptr,$18C050)
It seems there's an animal that's as captivating[LINE]
as it is ferocious near Terazzi.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A93D0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C068)
食べれば不老不死になれるという伝説をもつ[LINE]
貴重な桃。[LINE]
栄養価が非常に高いが、値段も高い。[END]
English:
//Text $1A93D0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C068)
Precious peach said to grant immortality.[LINE]
Its price is as high as its nutritional value.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9370
#WRITE(ptr,$18C06C)
トウケイの領土には人々が求めてやまない[LINE]
望みを叶える事ができるという植物が[LINE]
自生しているそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9370
#WRITE(ptr,$18C06C)
There seems to be a fruit that grows near Terazzi that[LINE]
can supposedly grant peoples' deepest desires.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9318
#WRITE(ptr,$18C084)
糸杉の木を材料に作られた巨大な箱舟。[LINE]
どうして内陸に船があるのかは謎。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A9318
#WRITE(ptr,$18C084)
Massive ark built from Cypress wood.[LINE]
Why it is inland is a mystery.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A92A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C088)
カルビオラのあたりに、地上で使う事が[LINE]
ないはずの巨大な建造物を見かけたという。[LINE]
目の錯覚ではないだろうか？[END]
English:
//Text $1A92A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C088)
They say a massive structure was found near [LINE]
Calviola that could never be used on land.[LINE]
Could it be a mirage?[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9238
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0A0)
偶然、一般市民に発掘された人間大の人形。[LINE]
夜中にひとりでに動くという気味の悪い[LINE]
噂がある。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9238
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0A0)
Human-sized doll excavated by chance.[LINE]
There are unsettling rumors that it[LINE]
moves by itself at night.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A91C0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0A4)
ジャンクランドの住民が、砂漠である物を[LINE]
見つけて家に持ち帰ったのだが、気持ちが[LINE]
悪い事が起こったので捨てたという。[END]
English:
//Text $1A91C0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0A4)
The citizens of Junkland supposedly brought something[LINE]
back from the desert that spooked them so much[LINE]
they threw it back.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9168
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0BC)
体に刺激を受けると発光する原生生物。[LINE]
真っ暗な海に光る波に時間を忘れてしまう。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A9168
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0BC)
Plankton that emits light when disturbed.[LINE]
Time flies watching the glowing waves[LINE]
amidst the pitch black sea.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9100
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0C0)
リーネの村の周辺の海岸では、時が経つのも[LINE]
忘れてしまうほど美しい景色を堪能できる[LINE]
場所があるそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9100
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0C0)
There seems to be vista on the beaches near Lienea[LINE]
that's so beautiful it draws you in for hours.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A90A0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0D8)
春先に大量発生した年は必ず猛暑になると[LINE]
いわれる虫。[LINE]
触るとけっこう熱い。[END]
English:
//Text $1A90A0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0D8)
Bug whose mass emergence in spring foretells[LINE]
a heat wave that year. Quite hot to the touch.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A9030
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0DC)
アルメイダの村の近くで熱いものが急に[LINE]
ぶつかってきたそうだが、ビックリして[LINE]
何かは確認できなかったらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A9030
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0DC)
It seems someone was struck with something scalding[LINE]
near Armeida, but the encounter was too sudden to[LINE]
determine its features.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8FC8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0F4)
大雪の夜の翌朝に見つかる巨大な雪だるま。[LINE]
「風のいたずら」説もあるが、定かではない。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A8FC8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0F4)
Giant snowman found the morning after a[LINE]
great blizzard. Theorized to be a cosmic [LINE]
prank, but no definitive proof exists.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8F78
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0F8)
スノーフリアの一帯では、一晩でとても[LINE]
巨大な雪のかたまりが出現するそうだ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A8F78
#WRITE(ptr,$18C0F8)
There's apparently an enormous mass of snow[LINE]
that appeared overnight near Frostheim.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8EE8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C110)
ピンク色の体毛を持つ、リス科の小動物。[LINE]
突然変異によってしか発生しない希少種で、[LINE]
滑空する姿を見ると恋愛が成就するという。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8EE8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C110)
Squirrel with pink fur. A rare mutated[LINE]
species, said to grant true love to any[LINE]
who witness it gliding.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8E78
#WRITE(ptr,$18C114)
ノイシュタットの周辺では若者に人気の[LINE]
希少動物が存在するという。[LINE]
目立つ姿をしているからすぐわかるらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8E78
#WRITE(ptr,$18C114)
There's a creature near Neustadt that's said to be[LINE]
a hit with young men. It should be easy enough[LINE]
to identify upon spotting it.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8DF8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C12C)
砂の中の微生物を食べる姿がダンゴを[LINE]
作っているように見える小型のカニ。[LINE]
小ぶりだが、しっかりとしたダシがとれる。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8DF8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C12C)
Small crab that seems to be making[LINE]
dangos while feeding. Small,[LINE]
but makes a nice soup base.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8D90
#WRITE(ptr,$18C130)
ノイシュタットの近くの海岸ではスープや[LINE]
鍋料理に大活躍の食材となる動物がたくさん[LINE]
棲息しているそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8D90
#WRITE(ptr,$18C130)
There seems to be a prolific creature[LINE]
on the shores near Neustadt that[LINE]
makes an excellent ingredient.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8D18
#WRITE(ptr,$18C148)
砂に含まれる石英の粒がこすれあうと[LINE]
微妙なガラス質の音を奏でる砂浜。[LINE]
砂が汚れてしまうと音がでなくなってしまう。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8D18
#WRITE(ptr,$18C148)
Sandy beach that produces a strange glassy sound[LINE]
due to the movement of small quartz particles[LINE]
mixed into the sand. Remains silent if dirtied.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8CB8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C14C)
リーネの村の周辺の海岸では、恵まれた[LINE]
自然が奏でるかわいい音楽が聞ける場所が[LINE]
あるという。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8CB8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C14C)
It seems there's a beach near Lienea where[LINE]
a tune can be heard amid the abounding[LINE]
natural beauty.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8C40
#WRITE(ptr,$18C164)
三つの対になる外エラを持ち、肺で呼吸し、[LINE]
餌はきちんと噛まないと気が済まないという[LINE]
海に棲む古代魚。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8C40
#WRITE(ptr,$18C164)
Ancient fish that eats and breathes air[LINE]
with its three pair of external gills.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8BD0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C168)
漁師たちの間でおかしな生物の目撃情報が[LINE]
多発しているらしいが、情報が錯そうして[LINE]
海にいる事しか分からないそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8BD0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C168)
There seem to be many eyewitness reports from[LINE]
fisherman of a strange creature, but the only[LINE]
thing they agree on is that it's from the sea.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8B48
#WRITE(ptr,$18C180)
年間を通して採取できるサボテンの実。[LINE]
カルバレイス地方では、乾くと強力に固まる[LINE]
果汁が接着剤として利用されている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8B48
#WRITE(ptr,$18C180)
Cactus fruit that can be picked year round.[LINE]
In Calvalese its juices are used as a[LINE]
powerful adhesive.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8AE8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C184)
ジャンクランドの周辺に住人に重宝されて[LINE]
いる接着剤の原料となる植物が自生している[LINE]
らしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8AE8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C184)
There seems to be a plant that grows near Junkland[LINE]
that the citizens fashion into a glue[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8A60
#WRITE(ptr,$18C19C)
カルビオラに生息する耐乾性一年草。[LINE]
草丈と花径が小さく、乾燥に強い。[LINE]
花言葉は「私の事を想ってください」。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8A60
#WRITE(ptr,$18C19C)
Drought-resistant annual plant found in Calviola.[LINE]
Short in height with small-sized flowers. In the[LINE]
language of flowers it means "Please think of me."[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8A08
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1A0)
カルビオラの辺りには、片想いの人に告白の[LINE]
代わりとして手渡す花が咲いているそうだ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A8A08
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1A0)
It seems there's a flower that blooms near Calviola[LINE]
that's given in place of confessions.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A89A0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1B8)
雪が降る冷たい川をのぼり、産卵をする鮭。[LINE]
凍った川を硬い口先で砕いて進む姿は圧巻。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A89A0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1B8)
Salmon that travels up cold and snowy rivers to[LINE]
lay its eggs. It cuts a striking figure as it breaks[LINE]
through frozen rivers with its stiff snout.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8948
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1BC)
ファンダリアとセインガルドを隔てている[LINE]
川では、根性のある魚を見る事ができる[LINE]
らしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8948
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1BC)
There's apparently a fish with a real steel will[LINE]
that can be found in the river between[LINE]
Seinegald and Phandaria.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A88D0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1D4)
ベルクラントの砲撃でできたクレーターに[LINE]
出現した古代の都市遺跡。[LINE]
その姿にロマンを感じずにはいられない。[END]
English:
//Text $1A88D0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1D4)
Ancient city ruins that appeared in a[LINE]
crater formed by Belcrant's bombardment.[LINE]
Smells of adventure.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8870
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1D8)
ベルクラントの砲撃でできたクレーターに[LINE]
よって、地中に埋もれていた芸術品が出現[LINE]
したそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8870
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1D8)
Something incredible has apparently been[LINE]
unearthed by the bombardment from Belcrant.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8808
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1F0)
５０人ほどの人間が中に入る事ができる[LINE]
木でできた巨大な馬の像。[LINE]
何に使われたのかは不明。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8808
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1F0)
Giant wooden horse that can fit[LINE]
up to 50 people within it.[LINE]
Its purpose is unknown.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A87A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1F4)
ノイシュタットの辺りには、何に使われた[LINE]
のかがわからない、不思議な木製の像が[LINE]
あるらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A87A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C1F4)
There seems to be a strange wooden figure[LINE]
near Neustadt with an unknown purpose.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8740
#WRITE(ptr,$18C20C)
高さ６０センチ、幅１１０センチの黄金で[LINE]
作られた仮面。[LINE]
合金の羽が９０枚ついている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8740
#WRITE(ptr,$18C20C)
A mask made of gold measuring 60cm by 110cm.[LINE]
Adorned with 90 metallic feathers.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A86C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C210)
リーネの村の近くで、チカチカと点滅する[LINE]
のを見た人がいるというが、残念ながら[LINE]
光の正体は見つけられなかったという。[END]
English:
//Text $1A86C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C210)
It's said that a flickering light was spotted near[LINE]
Lienea, but its source was unfortunately not found.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8650
#WRITE(ptr,$18C228)
エサを食べ続けていないと死んでしまう虫。[LINE]
オスは交尾後、メスは卵を産むとすぐに[LINE]
はかない命を終える。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8650
#WRITE(ptr,$18C228)
Insect that will perish unable to feed continually.[LINE]
The life of males end upon mating, the life of[LINE]
females upon laying their eggs.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A85F8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C22C)
アンスズーンの周辺には、命の大切さと[LINE]
はかなさを体現する健気な昆虫がいる[LINE]
らしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A85F8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C22C)
It seems there's an insect near Deimos that[LINE]
makes you appreciate the fragility of life.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8598
#WRITE(ptr,$18C244)
波打ち際を波に乗ってスイスイ移動する虫。[LINE]
大波が来ると空を飛んで逃げる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A8598
#WRITE(ptr,$18C244)
Bug that glides along the waves near beaches.[LINE]
Will fly into the air to escape large waves.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8558
#WRITE(ptr,$18C248)
どこかの小島にある海岸には波乗りが[LINE]
得意な昆虫がいるそうだ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A8558
#WRITE(ptr,$18C248)
There's apparently a bug on an island[LINE]
somewhere that's an exceptional surfer.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A84C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C260)
巨大な人の頭の像が散乱している神殿の跡。[LINE]
かつては王族たちの勇姿が祭られていた。[LINE]
王族の肖像の成れの果ては、かなり不気味。[END]
English:
//Text $1A84C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C260)
Temple ruins with giant head statues once used[LINE]
to memorialize royalty scattered about. The state[LINE]
of the former rulers is rather ominous.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8460
#WRITE(ptr,$18C264)
クレスタの辺りには、この地域に古代文明の[LINE]
存在を証明する遺跡があるという。[LINE]
一見の価値があるそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8460
#WRITE(ptr,$18C264)
There's said to be ruins near Cresta[LINE]
that prove the existence of ancient[LINE]
civilizations that are worth visiting.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A83D8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C27C)
エメラルドの原石に王の心得が刻まれた秘宝。[LINE]
先の戦乱によってファンダリア王家から[LINE]
消失し、行方がわからなくなっていた。[END]
English:
//Text $1A83D8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C27C)
Emerald slab engraved with a King's laws.[LINE]
Lost by the Phandarian royal family during[LINE]
the recent chaos.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8368
#WRITE(ptr,$18C280)
なぜかはわからないが、イグナシーの[LINE]
近くに、ファンダリア王家から所在が[LINE]
わからなくなっていた宝があるらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8368
#WRITE(ptr,$18C280)
For some unknown reason, a relic of the[LINE]
Phandarian royal family that went missing[LINE]
seems to have reappeared near Ignasea.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A82E0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C298)
光を増幅する石で作られた貴重な手鏡。[LINE]
月明かりでもはっきりと姿を映すため、[LINE]
化粧をしやすいと代々の女王に重宝された。[END]
English:
//Text $1A82E0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C298)
A precious hand mirror made from a stone[LINE]
that amplifies light. Prized by ancient queens[LINE]
due to its functioning even under moonlight.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8288
#WRITE(ptr,$18C29C)
ストレイライズ神殿の近くで、空に向かって[LINE]
かぼそく伸びる、ひとすじの光を見たらしい。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A8288
#WRITE(ptr,$18C29C)
There seems to be a thin beam of light pointing[LINE]
towards the sky near Straylize Temple.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8220
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2B4)
燃え尽きる事を知らない木槌。[LINE]
使う人間を選ぶかのように、強烈な熱気を[LINE]
発し続ける。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8220
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2B4)
An unburnable wooden mallet. Releases[LINE]
intense heat for all but its chosen user.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A81A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2B8)
守護竜の制御室があった空中都市の近くで、[LINE]
強烈な熱気を感じたらしいが、暑すぎて[LINE]
近づけず、原因はわからなかったそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A81A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2B8)
There's apparently a blazing heat near the city that[LINE]
held the Lumina Draconis' control center, but the[LINE]
intenseness made ascertaining its origin too difficult.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8140
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2D0)
標高の高い場所でしか咲かない花。[LINE]
花言葉は「アタック！」。[LINE]
山男にはおなじみの植物。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8140
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2D0)
Flower that only blooms at high elevations.[LINE]
Means "Attack!" in the language of flowers.[LINE]
A plant familiar to alpinists.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A80D8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2D4)
地上の高原に生えている山男におなじみの[LINE]
植物が、軍事基地だった空中都市の周辺でも[LINE]
見られるらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A80D8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2D4)
It seems a flower familiar to mountaineers grows[LINE]
near the city that used to be a military base.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8070
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2EC)
土砂と共に巻き上げられて外殻で突然変異を[LINE]
起こしたネズミ。[LINE]
長い体毛は常に濡れている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A8070
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2EC)
Rodent that mutated after being lifted[LINE]
up to the Outer Shell. Its long body hair[LINE]
is constantly wet.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A8020
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2F0)
ロディオンの周辺には地上で見る事の[LINE]
できない珍しい動物が棲息しているそうだ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A8020
#WRITE(ptr,$18C2F0)
There seems to be a rare creature that lives near[LINE]
Rodeon that's never been seen before on the surface[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7F90
#WRITE(ptr,$18C308)
プラチナのように輝く甲羅を持つ希少な亀。[LINE]
硬い甲羅と卵が高級装飾品として密漁される[LINE]
ため、種の絶滅が危ぶまれている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7F90
#WRITE(ptr,$18C308)
Rare turtle with a shell that shines[LINE]
like platinum. Endangered due to being[LINE]
poached for its tough shell and eggs.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7F30
#WRITE(ptr,$18C30C)
海を移動していると、運がよければ絶滅寸前[LINE]
の美しい輝きを放つ動物に遭遇できる事が[LINE]
あるという。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7F30
#WRITE(ptr,$18C30C)
It seems there's an endangered creature[LINE]
you might encounter while traveling out[LINE]
in the ocean.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7EC0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C324)
海中で絶える事なく塩を出し続けるという[LINE]
不思議な石の臼。[LINE]
海水が塩辛い原因であるといった伝説もある。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7EC0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C324)
Mysterious millstone that continues to release[LINE]
salt even underwater. Legends say it is the[LINE]
source of the ocean's salty taste.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7E70
#WRITE(ptr,$18C328)
海の浅瀬には、おとぎ話のような不思議な[LINE]
ものが落ちている事があるらしい。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A7E70
#WRITE(ptr,$18C328)
There's a mysterious item in the shoals[LINE]
that seems like it's straight from a fairy-tale.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7E08
#WRITE(ptr,$18C340)
外殻で突然変異を起こした、動物や昆虫の[LINE]
血を吸うカエル。[LINE]
体は小さいが動きは遅い。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7E08
#WRITE(ptr,$18C340)
Bloodsucking frog that mutated on[LINE]
the Outer Shell. Slow in spite of its[LINE]
small size.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7DB0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C344)
ダイクロフトの周辺には危害を加えてくる[LINE]
動物がいるので、注意して歩く必要がある[LINE]
そうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7DB0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C344)
There's apparently a dangerous creature near[LINE]
Dycroft, so take care when traveling around it.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7D20
#WRITE(ptr,$18C35C)
燃えた後には水しか残らない不思議な物質。[LINE]
炎と氷の妖精の愛の結晶という伝説がある。[LINE]
別名は「燃える氷」で、触ると冷たい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7D20
#WRITE(ptr,$18C35C)
Curious substance that leaves nothing but water after[LINE]
it's burned. Said to be the child of the fire and ice[LINE]
spirits. Also known as fire ice, it is cold to the touch.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7CD0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C360)
どこかの海岸には、炎の妖精と氷の妖精の[LINE]
愛の結晶が発見できる場所があるという。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A7CD0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C360)
They say there's a shore somewhere where the[LINE]
love child of the fire and ice spirits can be found.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7C70
#WRITE(ptr,$18C378)
「ランブータン」という果物にそっくりな[LINE]
お尻をしている豚。[LINE]
ブーブーうるさい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7C70
#WRITE(ptr,$18C378)
Swine with backsides that look exactly like[LINE]
a rambutan fruit. Very loud and annoying.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7C08
#WRITE(ptr,$18C37C)
モリュウの領地には騒いでうるさいが、[LINE]
料理をするととてもおいしい、味な食材と[LINE]
なる動物がいるそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7C08
#WRITE(ptr,$18C37C)
There seems to be a rather loud and annoying[LINE]
creature near Moreau that makes for a[LINE]
rather tasty meal.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7BC0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C394)
セインガルド王国が建国を記念して[LINE]
建立した石碑。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A7BC0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C394)
Stone monument build to celebrate the[LINE]
founding of the Kingdom of Seinegald.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7B58
#WRITE(ptr,$18C398)
ダリルシェイドの近くには行商人たちの[LINE]
待ち合わせ場所などの目印として活躍する[LINE]
建造物があるらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7B58
#WRITE(ptr,$18C398)
It seems there's a structure near Darilsheid[LINE]
that's used as a meeting place between merchants.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7AE0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3B0)
六本の指を持つ珍しい猫。[LINE]
帆船のロープ登りや、船内のネズミ捕りが[LINE]
得意で船乗りに愛されている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7AE0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3B0)
Unusual six-toed cat.[LINE]
Loved by sailors for its[LINE]
mouse-catching prowess.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7A98
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3B4)
シデン領地には船乗りたちに愛されている[LINE]
希少な動物がいるそうだ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1A7A98
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3B4)
There's apparently a rare creature near[LINE]
Shiden that's beloved by sailors.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7A30
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3CC)
茎や葉の表面・葉柄などに刺激性の液を[LINE]
蓄えた刺毛がある多年草。[LINE]
触ると鋭い痛みがある。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7A30
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3CC)
Perennial plant lined top to bottom[LINE]
with irritant-laced stinging hairs.[LINE]
Sharply painful to the touch.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A79B0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3D0)
ある空中都市の周辺には、実験プラントから[LINE]
あふれた危険な植物が自生しているため、[LINE]
気をつけて歩かないと痛い目にあうらしい。[END]
English:
//Text $1A79B0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3D0)
It seems great care needs to be taken near[LINE]
a certain city due to plants overflowing from an[LINE]
experimentation plant.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7940
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3E8)
手にした者を幸せに導くという青い鳥。[LINE]
捕まえて大事にしていても、いつの間にか[LINE]
姿を消してしまう。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7940
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3E8)
Blue bird said to lead those who obtain it[LINE]
to happiness. Even if captured and taken[LINE]
care of, it will eventually disappear.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A78C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3EC)
技術研究施設のある空中都市の近くには、[LINE]
人々が求めてやまない望みを叶える事が[LINE]
できるという動物が棲息しているそうだ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A78C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C3EC)
There is supposedly a creature that lives near[LINE]
a city with a research facility that is said to[LINE]
be able to grant peoples' desires.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7878
#WRITE(ptr,$18A468)
かつて勇名を馳せた船。[LINE]
天地戦争で用いた電撃作戦を再び敢行して[LINE]
外殻に浮上した。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7878
#WRITE(ptr,$18A468)
A ship once known for its heroics.[LINE]
The ship has resurfaced once again to carry[LINE]
out the blitzkrieg strategy used in the Aeth'er War.[END]
